      • getMedicineInfo

        protected java.util.List<MedicineInformation> getMedicineInfo(java.lang.String pid,
                                                  java.util.Date today,
                                                  java.util.Date startTime,
                                                  java.util.Date endTime,
                                                  int alertType)
        Return information of the drug which patient has to take between startTime to endTime for an alert of type alertType

        set isErrorWhileRetreiving to true if some error occur while receiving information

        Parameters:
        pid - patientID
        today - new Date()
        startTime - startTime to fetch medicine Reminder
        endTime - endTime to fetch medicine Reminder
        alertType - ivr or sms
        Returns:
        List

      • updateSMSResponse

        protected static void updateSMSResponse(java.lang.String pnumber,
                     java.util.Date inDate,
                     java.lang.String message,
                     java.lang.String reply,
                     java.util.Date outDate,
                     boolean isSuccess,
                     java.lang.String transID)
        Update SMSResponse(maintains record of all the SMS Sent to the patient).
        Parameters:
        pnumber - Number from which sms has received
        inDate - Time when SMS is receieved
        message - Query receieved
        reply - Reply message to the Query
        outDate - TIme at which message is sent to SMS Gateway
        isSuccess - If the message is successfully sent to the Patient
        transID - transcation ID generated from the service provided by SMSGateway
